DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe the anatomic site of the extramedullary disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: External Medullary Bone Disease or Disorder Anatomic Site
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface._The central and spongy portion of the bone._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Named locations of or within the body.

The central and spongy portion of the bone.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person.
